titles.title: Youth Exchange Support Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for host families of foreign exchange and other students from $50 per month to $400 per month.
Youth Exchange Support Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Youth Exchange Support Act of 2015
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $50 to $400 per month the amount of the charitable contribution tax deduction for taxpayers who provide housing and support to a student enrolled in an educational program. This increased amount is adjusted for inflation for taxable years beginning after 2016.
